knimeNode.name: Mean and Basepeak Spectrum
knimeNode.shortDescription: This is a node which calculates and sketches a mean or a basepeak spectrum.

fullDescription.intro: We can use this node to calculate a mean and a baspeak spectrum using update methods that are initially suggested in Alan M. Race's thesis.
fullDescription.option: Choose Mean to calculate the mean spectrum or Basepeak to calculate the basepeak spectrum.
Choose yes to save the image, No otherwise.
Choose the location to save the image.
Choose the width of the created image.
Choose the height of the created image.

ports.inPort: Input the combined intensity and m/z values.
ports.outPort: Return the mean or basepeak spectrum.

views.view: Here is an image of the Mean or Basepeak Spectrum.
